DOC.detailed_description: Background : In Brazil , community health worker ( CHW ) member community hired government provide education care patient broad range health issue , include diabetes mellitus ( DM ) . However , CHW train diabetes education little known effectiveness intervention . The aim study evaluate effect diabetes education program deliver CHW improve metabolic control patient type 2 DM . Materials method : study randomize control trial conduct primary care unit . Eight CHW , provide care 118 patient , randomize two group receive one-month diabetes education program ( intervention group , patient n= 62 ) education course health issue ( control group , patient n= 56 ) . Each CHW responsible transmitting acquire knowledge patient respective work area . The primary outcome change HbA1C three month intervention .
